definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: Eachindependent cylinder's press-roller has precision micro-adjuster to guarantee the effect of sueding .
sentences.chinese: 每支獨立汽缸壓布輥精確的微調，能確保磨毛效果。

sentences.english: You could put the content of the spinner as a third argument.
sentences.chinese: 您可將微調控制項的內容作爲第三個參數引入。

sentences.english: She said my understanding of Darwinism needed some fine-tuning.
sentences.chinese: 她說我對進化論的理解需要一些微調。

sentences.english: Low-flow is stable for precision adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 低流量穩定，氣缸慢速微調更準時。

sentences.english: That takes patience, trial and error, with small adjustments to the aerial’s orientation being made as you switch from one station to another.
sentences.chinese: 換臺時得微調天線方向，那需要耐心和反覆調試。

sentences.english: Tweaked attendances in later stage cup competition matches played at neutral stadiums.
sentences.chinese: 微調在中立場地進行的杯賽後階段比賽的上座率。

sentences.english: Scribed or painted lines are not acceptable for trim or hole sight checks.
sentences.chinese: 在微調或窺孔檢測時，劃線或繪線是不可接受的。

sentences.english: Digital "tuning" of bias and gain eliminates the need to manipulate potentiometers or dials.
sentences.chinese: 數字“微調”的偏差和增益，無需操作電位計或撥號。

sentences.english: Carrier Drones are now able to change targets, increased speed, tweaked damage.
sentences.chinese: 艦載機現在可以切換目標，增加速度，微調傷害。

sentences.english: The greatest tweaker of his generation did not care to be tweaked.
sentences.chinese: 在自己的時代裏，最偉大的巧匠並不喜歡被微調。

sentences.english: Now we can see the values that will be used for the spinner.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我們可以看到將用於微調器的那些值。

sentences.english: On the other hand, we should continue to implement the relatively restrict monetary policy and put micro adjustment into practice timely and moderately.
sentences.chinese: 繼續實行適度從緊的貨幣政策，搞好適時適度微調。

sentences.english: ClearType Text Tuning and Display Color Calibration .
sentences.chinese: ClearType文字微調和顯示顏色校準。

sentences.english: The wedge device and the fine regulating device for sizing the phosphor-copper thin plates are also introduced.
sentences.chinese: 同時，還介紹了楔塊裝置及磷銅薄片整形的微調裝置。
爲什麼這麼多微調電容？

sentences.english: Micro adjustment functions. Support parts of line wheel and knife wheel micro adjustment during the production.
sentences.chinese: 支持生產過程中對部分刀輪和線輪進行微調。

definition: to adjust downwards/to lower (prices, wages etc)
to demote/to pass down to a lower unit
to weave/to plait/to compile/to put together (a lesson plan, budget etc)
